attributes.action: Speed check and camera in belper
attributes.additional_details: Last year my elderly cat poppy was killed by joy riders . Since then that number has gone up mainly for black cats . I think we need better traffic calming measures a speed check camera would help save cats lives and the owners minds
attributes.background: Larger speed humps and speed check camera this would save cats lives

rejection.details:
This is a matter for Derbyshire County Council, not the UK Government or Parliament.

You could start a petition on the Derbyshire County Council website, calling for speed bumps and cameras to be installed at this location, if that is something you'd like to see happen. You can find out how to do this here: https://www.derbyshire.gov.uk/council/have-your-say/petitions/petitions.aspx.

You could also ask your MP to raise this issue with the Council on your behalf. You can find your MP's contact details by entering your post code here: https://members.parliament.uk/FindYourMP
